name: Pokémon Donjon Mystère Online
storyline:
The artefact protected by the guardian of gravity, Gravius, has been shattered into pieces... the first in a long series of unusual events. Following battles between Gravius and Celestius, the travelling pokémon capable of travelling to other dimensions, mysterious phenomena have spread.

The sky is now dotted with strange portals, from which numerous pokémons are emerging. More and more of them are becoming aggressive... And some malevolent groups are on the move...

What really happened between these two legendary pokémons? Was it the destruction of the Gravity Stone that caused all this disruption? Should we expect the situation to get worse? There are still some grey areas...
summary:
PDMO is a French free 2D MMORPG based on the Pokemon Mystery Dungeon series. Embark on a unique adventure as one of 20 different pokemon starters! Missions, harvesting, crafting, tumultuous dungeons, events, pokemons and, above all, fun!

Start your adventure now!
